name: Mega Lava Fighter (2010)
description:
Short arcade game about fighting lava with water

Collect all pickups in a stage and then leave the exit to progress. Points gained are proportional to amount of water in stock. Shooting water and touching lava costs water, if you run out of water the stage must be restarted.

WSAD - move

left mouse - shoot water

** NOTE: online features no longer functional and attempting to access online highscores will cause the game to crash
